_header: I ask this soul for to win
Subjects: Virgin Mary, aid to salvation; Virgin Mary, miracles of
_description: Verses in a Latin miraculum beatae Mariae — sixteen lines in couplets, interspersed in Latin prose

Eton34.First Lines:
I aske thys sowle for to wynneqwech I know ful of
                    synne…
Eton34.Last Lines:
…For þe modyrs besechyngswech is þe fadyrs
                    answeryng
Eton34.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             “A Latin Miracle with Middle English Verses.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         72 (1971): 77-85: 84-5.
